1056800.name: Idle Champions - Explorer's Pack
1056800.description:
Celebrate the release of Idle Champions on web at Kongregate, Armor Games, and Codename Games with this EPIC Explorer's Pack! Get a head start on your Forgotten Realms adventures with this pack of epic potions, gold chests (containing 2 guaranteed Shiny loot cards), and an exclusive skin for Bruenor!

This pack includes:

  • 16 Gold Chests (containing 2 guaranteed Shiny loot cards)
  • 2500 Gems
  • 2 Epic Potions of Fire Breath
  • 2 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength
  • 2 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance
  • 2 Epic Potions of Speed
  • 2 Epic Bounty Contracts
  • Exclusive Skin for Bruenor (Champion Bruenor)
